title: Netflix
description: clone of home, login (with authorization), profiles, browse pages.

title: TTSBookReader
description: android book reader with the core feature of reading books aloud using TTS engine. Support Epub v2 and custom JSON book formats.
stack: react-native (expo), redux-toolkit, redux-persist, react-native-paper, react-navigation, axios.

title: Starbucks rewards
description: clone of the rewards page from Starbucks website.

title: React Movie
description: simple movie watchlist, uses themoviedb api.
stack: Typescript, react, redux-toolkit, redux-persist, material-ui, react-router, axios.
